channel.title: Partition on A Place to Remember
channel.description: Recent content in Partition on A Place to Remember

item.title: Erasing Partition Table
item.description: Well, I always use gparted to erase my partition table and sometimes it fail miserably. The most accurate way is to use sgdisk. We can erase our partition table like this: $ sgdisk --zap-all /dev/sda
